# vDSP_biquad2_CreateSetup

**Function**

Builds a data structure that contains precalculated single-precision data for stereo biquadratic filter functions to use.

## Declaration

```swift
vDSP_biquad_Setup vDSP_biquad2_CreateSetup(const double *, const size_t, const IIRChannel);
```

## Parameters

- **Parameter 0**: A pointer to the double-precision filter coefficients. 
- **Parameter 1**: The number of sections in the biquadratic filter.
- **Parameter 2**: An enumeration that specifies the channel.

## Discussion

If the channel parameter is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/1645949-anonymous/vdsp_iirmonoleft] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/1645949-anonymous/vdsp_iirmonoright], the number of elements in the coefficients array must be five times the number of sections. The filter applies pass-through coefficients to the other channel.

If the channel parameter is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/1645949-anonymous/vdsp_iirstereo], the number of elements in the coefficients array must be ten times the number of sections. Specify five left-channel coefficients followed by five right-channel coefficients.

## Biquadratic Infinite Impulse Response (IIR) Filters

- **vDSP_biquad2**: Applies a single-precision stereo biquadratic IIR filter.
- **IIRChannel**: Constants that specify which channels a stereo biquadratic filter operates.
- **vDSP_biquad2_CopyState**: Copies the filter state from one biquadratic filter object to another.
- **vDSP_biquad2_ResetState**: Resets the filter state of a single-precision stereo biquadratic filter object.
- **vDSP_biquad2_DestroySetup**: Destroys a single-precision stereo biquadratic IIR setup object.
